publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-456# Fiona Hyslop: Car Park Charges—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the proposals by West Lothian Healthcare NHS Trust to charge for car parking at St John’s Hospital in Livingston as a method of funding essential local NHS services; recognises the difficulties this will cause for patients, staff and visitors and calls upon the Trust to meet urgently with the Executive and West Lothian Council to resolve this matter. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Kay Ullrich*
S1M-456# Car Park Charges (lodged on 24 January 2000) Michael Russell*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-456# Car Park Charges (lodged on 24 January 2000) Michael Matheson*

S1M-456# Fiona Hyslop: Car Park Charges—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the proposals by West Lothian Healthcare NHS Trust to charge for car parking at St John’s Hospital in Livingston as a method of funding essential local NHS services; recognises the difficulties this will cause for patients, staff and visitors and calls upon the Trust to meet urgently with the Executive and West Lothian Council to resolve this matter. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Margo MacDonald, Kay Ullrich, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Michael Matheson
S1M-456# Car Park Charges (lodged on 24 January 2000) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-456# Car Park Charges (lodged on 24 January 2000) Brian Adam*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Linda Fabiani*, Shona Robison*

Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Margo MacDonald, Kay Ullrich, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Michael Matheson, Tricia Marwick, Brian Adam, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Gil Paterson, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Tommy Sheridan*, Alasdair Morgan*

Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Margo MacDonald, Kay Ullrich, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Michael Matheson, Tricia Marwick, Brian Adam, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Gil Paterson, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Andrew Wilson
